verses.verse: אֶפְרַ֜יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim רֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> feedeth ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> on wind וְרֹדֵ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> and followeth קָדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> after the east wind כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> he הַיּ֕וֹם <S%H3117><s%> he daily כָּזָ֥ב <S%H3577><s%> lies וָשֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> and desolation יַרְבֶּ֑ה <S%H7235><s%> increaseth וּבְרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> a covenant עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אַשּׁ֣וּר <S%H804><s%> with the Assyrians יִכְרֹ֔תוּ <S%H3772><s%> and they do make וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and oil לְמִצְרַ֥יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt יוּבָֽל׃ <S%H2986><s%> is carried

וְרִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> hath also a controversy לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> with Judah וְלִפְקֹ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> and will punish עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob כִּדְרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> according to his ways כְּמַעֲלָלָ֖יו <S%H4611><s%> according to his doings יָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> will he recompense לֽוֹ׃

בַּבֶּ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> in the womb עָקַ֣ב <S%H6117><s%> by the heel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> He took his brother וּבְאוֹנ֖וֹ <S%H202><s%> and by his strength שָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8280><s%> he had power אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> with God

וָיָּ֤שַׂר <S%H7786><s%> Yea he had power אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with מַלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> over the angel וַיֻּכָ֔ל <S%H3201><s%> and prevailed בָּכָ֖ה <S%H1058><s%> he wept וַיִּתְחַנֶּן־ <S%H2603><s%> and made supplication ל֑וֹ בֵּֽית־ אֵל֙ <S%H1008><s%> him [in] Bethel יִמְצָאֶ֔נּוּ <S%H4672><s%> unto him he found וְשָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and there he spake עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> Even
וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Even the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God הַצְּבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD זִכְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H2143><s%> [is] his memorial

וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you בֵּאלֹהֶ֣יךָ <S%H430><s%> thou to thy God תָשׁ֑וּב <S%H7725><s%> Therefore turn חֶ֤סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy וּמִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> and judgment שְׁמֹ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> keep וְקַוֵּ֥ה <S%H6960><s%> and wait אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> on thy God תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> continually

כְּנַ֗עַן <S%H3667><s%> [He is] a merchant בְּיָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> [are] in his hand מֹאזְנֵ֥י <S%H3976><s%> the balances מִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> of deceit לַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <S%H6231><s%> to oppress אָהֵֽב׃ <S%H157><s%> he loveth

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> And Ephraim אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely עָשַׁ֔רְתִּי <S%H6238><s%> Yet I am become rich מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> I have found me out א֖וֹן <S%H202><s%> substance לִ֑י כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְגִיעַ֕י <S%H3018><s%> [in] all my labours לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No יִמְצְאוּ־ <S%H4672><s%> they shall find לִ֖י עָוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> none iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> in me that [were] sin

וְאָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> And I [that am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עֹ֛ד <S%H5750><s%> again אוֹשִֽׁיבְךָ֥ <S%H3427><s%> will yet make thee to dwell בָאֳהָלִ֖ים <S%H168><s%> in tabernacles כִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> as in the days מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the solemn feast

וְדִבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H1696><s%> I have also spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> by the prophets וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I חָז֣וֹן <S%H2377><s%> visions הִרְבֵּ֑יתִי <S%H7235><s%> and I have multiplied וּבְיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> by the ministry הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets אֲדַמֶּֽה׃ <S%H1819><s%> and used similitudes

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo גִּלְעָ֥ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead אָ֙וֶן֙ <S%H205><s%> [Is there] iniquity אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> also שָׁ֣וְא <S%H7723><s%> are worthless הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּגִּלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> in Gilgal שְׁוָרִ֣ים <S%H7794><s%> bullocks זִבֵּ֑חוּ <S%H2076><s%> they sacrifice גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Yes מִזְבְּחוֹתָם֙ <S%H4196><s%> yea their altars כְּגַלִּ֔ים <S%H1530><s%> [are] as heaps עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Beside תַּלְמֵ֥י <S%H8525><s%> in the furrows שָׂדָֽי׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the fields

וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <S%H1272><s%> fled יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> into the country אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ד <S%H5647><s%> served יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel בְּאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> for a wife וּבְאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> and for a wife שָׁמָֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> he kept

וּבְנָבִ֕יא <S%H5030><s%> And by a prophet הֶעֱלָ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> brought יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וּבְנָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> and by a prophet נִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> was he preserved

הִכְעִ֥יס <S%H3707><s%> provoked [him] to anger אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim תַּמְרוּרִ֑ים <S%H8563><s%> most bitterly וְדָמָיו֙ <S%H1818><s%> his blood עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and יִטּ֔וֹשׁ <S%H5203><s%> therefore shall he leave וְחֶ֨רְפָּת֔וֹ <S%H2781><s%> upon him and his reproach יָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> return ל֖וֹ אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <S%H136><s%> his Lord
